FLIGHT_CONTROL.NAME: A320
FLIGHT_CONTROL.COMPONENT: INPUT fcs/pitch-trim-sum MIN -25 MAX 35 OUTPUT fcs/elevator-pos-rad GAIN 0.018
INPUT fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -20 MAX 15 GAIN 0.02 OUTPUT fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -20 MAX 15 INVERT GAIN 0.02 OUTPUT fcs/right-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT fcs/yaw-trim-sum INPUT fcs/yaw-damper-rate INPUT fcs/yaw-damper-beta CLIPTO -1 1
INPUT fcs/rudder-sum MIN -25 MAX 25 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/rudder-pos-rad
